attributes.action: actively persue prosecution of any MP who has defrauded the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the revelations around the blatant misuse of MP Expenses and other misuses of funds we MUST see proprtionate and realistic punishment of those responsible. A member of the public would expect to be prosecuted for fraud, why not an MP when their honour should, by dint of the title, be beyond question.

rejection.details:
The government has no role in prosecuting individuals. 
MP's expenses more generally are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
